import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import TrendingCourses from '../../landing_page/trending_courses' const Home = ({lastname}) => { return ( <>
Hi {lastname ? lastname : }, Welcome to your Dashboard
Start Learning
) } export default Home
